pages.text:
Let us help make your event even sweeter.
Dessert Tables
Provide a variety of individual desserts to your guests with a custom dessert table, available a basic, plus, and premium package options.
Ice Cream Cart
Select a variety of different ice cream flavors, toppings, and add-ons to make your event one your guests will never forget.
Custom Favors
Custom chocolates, cookies, and more designed to match your wedding theme. Perfect for welcome bags, table favors, or thank you gifts.
Key Lime Pie Products
Give your guest a taste of the Keys: available as full Key Lime Pies, individual pie tarts, and gluten free pie options.
Whether it’s cakes, dessert tables, custom chocolates, a full spread ice cream cart, or anything else you can dream up, we are to help bring a little taste of the Keys to any event. From weddings to birthday parties to corporate events, we do it all.
Inquire Now!
Gallery Strips
FAQs
What types of events can you do?
Weddings, birthday parties, festivals, baby showers, bachelorette parties, corporate events… no matter the occasion, we can help sweeten things up.
How much does it cost?
We offer a variety of custom packages and pricing options. For a quote, email events@keylargochocolates.com or fill out the form in your desired event webpage.
What kinds of products do you offer?
Ice cream, cookies, chocolates, tarts, pies, cakes, and more! We have a wide variety of products to suit your needs. However, some events will be limited to what products are available, due to external factors such as heat, electricity, space, etc.
Can I hold an event at your shop?
Absolutely! Just fill out the form and express your interest in holding your event at our shop and we’ll get back to you with availability.
